item.title: About Visual Studio 2015
item.description: I don’t know how long you’ve been on the Visual Studio train, but my personal experience started when Visual C++ 6.0 was the only game in the town. MFC and ATL were the major solid libraries that most developers relied on. However, my primary focus of this post is more about the evolution of Visual Studio.Net since 2002.
